title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama project: get up and running with Llama 2 and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, available on npm as 'ollama'.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, published on PyPI as 'ollama'.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with multi-model support, file uploads, and role play.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with Android compatibility.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama API.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper that adds progress bars, model search, and config management.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home Assistant custom component exposing Ollama as a conversation agent.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local AI code completion via Ollama.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight Flutter desktop app for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-node
summary: Early official Node.js bindings (superseded by ollama-js but still maintained).

title: ollama-chat
summary: Self-hosted team chat (Slack-like) that uses Ollama for on-prem AI assistance.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated collection of custom Modelfiles and quantized GGUFs.

title: ollama-distro
summary: Build scripts to create minimal Linux distro images that boot straight into Ollama.

title: ollama-exporter
summary: Prometheus exporter exposing Ollama runtime metrics (tokens/s, queue depth, GPU util).

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim language client for Ollama with async/await and native JSON streaming.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with IAsyncEnumerable streaming.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.
